description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the PowerShell elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38047):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates from the official Microsoft update catalog.
2. For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5040442.
3. For Windows 11 Version 21H2, apply KB5040431.
4. For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5040427.
5. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Applying these updates resolves the improper input validation vulnerability that may allow elevation of privilege in PowerShell.
- It’s crucial to confirm your system is running the corresponding versions mentioned before applying updates. 
- For manual installation, download the update packages from the following links:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system supports the applicable versions and back up critical data before proceeding with the installation.
